Keum

Korean: 금

Height:

Group (2021-present):
EPEX

Introduction

Keum is a South Korean singer and actor under C9 Entertainment. As a trainee, he appeared and competed in the hit survival program "Produce X 101". He made his official debut in 2021 as the rapper and center of the boy group EPEX.
